name: Surgalign Holdings, Inc.
description: Surgalign Holdings, Inc. is a global medical technology company focused on elevating the standard of care in spine surgery. Founded in 2019, Surgalign is committed to developing innovative solutions that improve surgical outcomes and enhance the lives of patients. The company specializes in advanced spinal implants, digital technology, and surgical solutions that are designed to support surgeons in their efforts to achieve the best possible patient outcomes. Through its proprietary technology and products, Surgalign aims to simplify complex procedures and provide surgeons with the tools they need to enhance precision and safety in surgery. The company is also focused on leveraging digital health solutions to improve surgical workflows, enhance decision-making, and provide real-time data analytics. With a mission to transform spine surgery through innovation and excellence, Surgalign is positioned to make a significant impact in the orthopedic device market.
